mapper.select: SELECT a.idx, a.title, a.default_thumbnail_file, a.read_count, a.category_name FROM VW_NARO_NEWS a WHERE LEFT(a.publish_date,10) >= DATE_FORMAT( date_add(now(), interval -1 month), '%Y. %c. %e.' ) ORDER BY a.read_count DESC, a.publish_date DESC, a.idx DESC LIMIT 9;
SELECT a.idx, a.title, a.banner_file, a.category_name FROM VW_NARO_NEWS a WHERE banner_yn='Y' ORDER BY cate1;
SELECT a.*, a.category_name AS cate_name, a.cate1 AS cate1_idx, a.default_banner_file FROM VW_NARO_NEWS a WHERE a.del_yn='N' AND a.idx=#{idx};

SELECT a.*, b.name AS cate_name, b.parent_idx AS cate1_idx, CASE WHEN IfNull(a.banner_file,'') = '' THEN b.default_banner_file ELSE a.banner_file END AS default_banner_file FROM NARO_NEWS a INNER JOIN NARO_NEWS_CATEGORY b ON a.category_idx=b.idx WHERE a.del_yn='N' AND a.idx=#{idx};

SELECT rownum FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum, a.idx FROM VW_NARO_NEWS a INNER JOIN ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=0 ) AS t2 WHERE a.category_idx=#{categoryIdx} ORDER BY a.publish_date DESC, a.idx DESC ) src WHERE src.idx=#{idx};

SELECT idx FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum, a.idx FROM VW_NARO_NEWS a INNER JOIN ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=0 ) AS t2 WHERE a.category_idx=#{categoryIdx} ORDER BY a.publish_date DESC, a.idx DESC ) src WHERE src.rownum=#{rownum};

SELECT max(publish_date) as news_idx, category_idx from VW_NARO_NEWS a INNER JOIN NARO_NEWS_CATEGORY x ON a.category_idx=x.idx AND x.del_yn='N' AND x.is_open='Y' WHERE cate1=#{cate1} GROUP BY category_idx ORDER BY news_idx DESC LIMIT 6;
SELECT * FROM VW_NARO_NEWS WHERE WRITE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY WRITE_DATE;
